How many people are affected by protein S deficiency ?,"Mild protein S deficiency is estimated to occur in approximately 1 in 500 individuals. Severe protein S deficiency is rare; however, its exact prevalence is unknown.",GHR,protein S deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to protein S deficiency ?,"Protein S deficiency is caused by mutations in the PROS1 gene. This gene provides instructions for making protein S, which is found in the bloodstre
